heading: Betrayerâ€™s Row Dungeon Guide
content: Betrayer's Row features a key Necromancer resource aspect, the . The Bees, however, might make you avoid this dungeon. Not the bees! It's easily accessible by traveling from Fractured Peaks, so you can do this one early if you so desire. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
